title: Moving to a different state!
body: I'm moving from Southwest Florida to Chesterfield, VA. I just want to know if I should submit a ticket to riot saying that there will be a different location / login to my account. I don't want them thinking I'm account sharing since there will be a period my account will not be online and it will be going / logging in from Florida then to Virginia.

replies.body: Moving shouldn't cause issues with access to your account, so there's no need to submit a ticket for awareness.  As long as you continue to play with positive sportsmanship in mind, there's nothing to worry about.  Hope that helps, and I dig your Echo Fox flair!
